questions.question: Which of these is NOT a meaning of 'Allah'?
options: The Only Deity Worthy of Worship

questions.question: How often should we remember the name of Allah?

options: To ask for blessings and guidance

What never runs out according to this lesson?
What should we do because Allah is Ar-Raheem?
options: Thank Him for being kind and loving

questions.question: What does knowing Allah is the King teach us?
What belongs to us according to this lesson?
options: Nothing; it all belongs to Allah

questions.question: How should we feel about what we have?
options: Grateful and use it to please Allah

How is everything Allah does described?

options: The Giver of Faith and Security

options: What we do in secret and public

What does Allah fix?
options: What is broken and makes things right

questions.question: What can Allah do with hard situations?

options: It's perfect and full of honour, not like human pride

Where can we see signs of the Creator?

Is anything in the world random?
options: No, Allah made it all fit perfectly together

questions.question: What is in every part of Allah's creation?

options: So we can recognise His creativity

questions.question: What should we thank Allah for?
options: How He made us—perfectly for our purpose

options: Hides them and replaces with good

options: All injustice and falsehood with His truth

questions.question: What does Allah give to every creature?
options: The food and help it needs

questions.question: Where does our rizq come from?
options: Only from Allah, not from people

options: Birds in the sky depending on Him

options: Our heart to faith and life to ease

questions.question: What does Allah know even when we hide them?

options: He knows best what is good for us

What may delayed things protect us from?
When does life feel full of blessings?
What should we do in times of ease?
options: Thank Him and share with others

questions.question: Why does Allah lower people through tests?
options: So they turn back to Him with humility

questions.question: What does Allah raise in people?
Who does Allah lift up?
options: People who remember Him and live honestly

questions.question: What can lift our rank with Allah?
Who does Allah give honour to?
options: Those who obey Him and live with truth

questions.question: Who does Allah lower?
options: Those who turn away from Him and do wrong

questions.question: What should we stay away from?
When does Allah hear our duʿaa?
What does this Name help us do?
options: Speak kindly, knowing Allah hears all words

questions.question: What does Allah see?
options: Everything clearly, no matter how small

When should we try to please Allah?
What are Allah's rulings based on?
What should we do when we deal with others?
How does Allah reward and punish?

options: In ways we don't even notice

questions.question: How does Allah's kindness reach us?
Where should we look for Allah's gentle care?
What does Allah know about our future?
When should we trust His wisdom?
options: Even when we don't understand His plans

questions.question: When does Allah punish us?
options: He is patient and does not punish right away

questions.question: Why does Allah give time to people?
options: So they can repent and change

options: Even a smile or helping hand

questions.question: Can anyone compare to Allah?
options: No one can reach His level

questions.question: Why do we raise our hands in duʿaa?
options: Because He is the Most High

questions.question: Is Allah's greatness limited?
options: No, His greatness has no end

questions.question: When we say 'Allahu Akbar', what do we remember?

options: No, nothing can unless He allows it

options: Act with honesty even when alone

options: Always, in the way that is best for us

questions.question: Why should we keep calling on Allah?
options: He loves when we ask Him

options: Allah can provide for everyone at the same time

options: Those who turn to Him and do good

options: Show love and kindness to others

What will Allah do to everyone?

questions.question: What does belief in resurrection teach us?
options: This life is all that matters

questions.question: What should we do knowing we will meet Allah?

options: Allah will be the ultimate Witness

What does Allah guide us to?
What should we put our trust in?
What does Allah manage for us?

options: Do good deeds because they are all counted

questions.question: How did Allah create everything?
options: From nothing, for the first time

options: A step to the next life

options: Trust He is always alive and listening

questions.question: Does Allah need anything?

options: No, He depends on no one
